text:
Hey <!channel>! 

We have finished our programme, however we will be *announcing the leaderboards & final winner shortly*!!  :tada::trophy::grin::grin::trophy::tada:

>Also to note, at some point in the near future we aim to have a way for you to keep up with your previous mentees, including those from our 2 pilot studies :relaxed::relaxed: :wave::wave:
<@U00> uploaded a file: <https://prospelaautumn1.slack.com/files/U7CQMS6N4/F88QGFM88/2nd_half_e-mentor_leaderboard.png|2nd Half E-Mentor Leaderboard.png>

*THE 2ND ROUND RESULTS ARE IN!!* <!everyone>
Congratulations to *<@U5WR9CJTC>* for winning in terms of activity over the final duration of our pilot programme! She'll shortly be the proud owner of a PROSPELA T-SHIRT & LinkedIn recommendation from Prospela! :champagne::champagne:

We also have *a few shout-outs* for some other *outstanding efforts* over the programme...:checkered_flag:

>*Sarah, Georgina, Helen & Andy M* for being the most camera snapping happy! Pictures/videos really do speak 1000 words :camera_with_flash:

>*Coleen* for progressing an internship within her company for her mentee. It's rare these students get a useful and inspiring work experience, let alone the chance to experience an architecture firm!  :classical_building:

>*Helen & Christian* for going out of their way to recruit an additional E-Mentor to support their student - now that's what we call spreading the love :raised_hands:

>*Christian*, for being a speedy Gonzales. He's had 2 major projects come in this last month and 3 students at once this programme, yet his av. response rate was still probably within minutes!?? :rocket::flushed:

And again a HUGE thank you to all of you for your efforts. We've had some really useful feedback and learnings from both mentor and mentees *(^^ KEEP IT COMING!! The feedback form link is a few posts above ^^)* :smiley::bowtie:
